events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on Main Street during morning rush hour.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident following initial report and policy verification.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this vehicle collision case and contact the customer shortly.
The claim was formally acknowledged and the customer was sent confirmation along with claim reference number.
We requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and insurance documents from the customer.
The customer submitted all required documents including detailed photos and official police report promptly.
Our investigation team began verifying the claim details, reviewing submitted documents and contacting witnesses.
The investigation was completed successfully confirming the liability and extent of damage sustained in collision.
A settlement offer was prepared and communicated to the customer based on assessed damages and policy terms.
The customer provided positive feedback appreciating the timely updates and clarity of the settlement offer.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was officially approved without any further conditions or issues.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s designated account as agreed.
The claim was successfully closed after payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction with the resolution.
The case files and documentation were archived securely for future reference as per company policy.
